metadata.description: 100 synthetic prompts representing real material engineer queries

prompts.query: What is the minimum yield strength of 2205 duplex stainless steel?
What is the tensile strength requirement for S32750 super duplex?
What is the minimum elongation for TP316L austenitic pipe?
What hardness limit applies to S32205 duplex pipe?
Compare yield strength of 2304 vs 2205 duplex grades
What is the chromium content range for S31803?
What is the maximum carbon content for 316L stainless?
What is the molybdenum range for S32750?
What nitrogen content is required for S32205?
Does S32760 contain tungsten? If so, how much?
What is the nickel content for TP304 austenitic steel?
What is the PREN formula for duplex stainless steel?
What copper content is allowed in S32550?
What is the sulfur limit for S32205 duplex?
What silicon content is permitted in TP316H?
What is the solution annealing temperature for S32205?
What quench method is required for duplex stainless after heat treatment?
prompts.expected_answer: Rapid cooling in water or by other means

prompts.query: What is the heat treatment temperature for S32750 (2507)?
What temperature is required for TP321H cold finished pipe?
Is air cooling acceptable for any duplex grade?
What is the solution treatment hold time for duplex forgings?
prompts.expected_answer: Minimum 30 min per inch of maximum section thickness

prompts.query: What temperature range applies to S32760 heat treatment?
What is the minimum annealing temperature for TP304 pipe?
What quench temperature must duplex forgings reach?
Can S31254 super austenitic be direct quenched after hot forming?
prompts.expected_answer: Yes, if temperature is not less than minimum solution treatment temperature

prompts.query: Which duplex grade has the highest PREN value?
prompts.expected_answer: S32707 with PREN typically >45 due to high N content (0.30-0.50%)

prompts.query: What test method detects detrimental intermetallic phases in duplex?
prompts.expected_answer: ASTM A923 Methods A, B, or C

prompts.query: What is the minimum PREN requirement for S32750?
prompts.expected_answer: PREN ≥ 41 per formula Cr + 3.3 × Mo + 16 × N

prompts.query: What intergranular corrosion test is referenced for austenitic pipe?
What ferric chloride test is used for duplex pitting resistance?
What filler metal is specified for welding S31803 duplex pipe?
What is the maximum weld repair length for duplex pipe seams?
What welding process is required for weld seam repairs?
What filler metal class is used for TP316 pipe repairs?
What minimum wall thickness allows weld repairs on duplex pipe?
prompts.expected_answer: 0.188 in. [4.8 mm] for NPS 6 or larger

prompts.query: How must weld-repaired pipe be marked?
prompts.expected_answer: With symbol 'WR' and noted on certificate of tests

prompts.query: What cold reduction is required for HCW austenitic pipe?
prompts.expected_answer: Not less than 35% reduction in thickness of both wall and weld

prompts.query: What radiographic inspection is required before cold working HCW pipe?
prompts.expected_answer: 100% per ASME BPVC Section VIII, Division 1, Paragraph UW-51

prompts.query: How many tension tests are required per lot of 100 pipes?
prompts.expected_answer: One tension test for lots of not more than 100 pipes

prompts.query: What percentage of duplex pipe requires flattening tests?
What is the hydrostatic test pressure calculation basis for duplex?
prompts.expected_answer: S = 50% of specified minimum yield strength

prompts.query: What NDE methods are allowed for duplex pipe testing?
What notch depth is used for UT reference standards?
prompts.expected_answer: 12.5% of nominal wall or 0.004 in., whichever is greater

prompts.query: What signal-to-noise ratio is required for NDE?
What grain size is required for TP304H pipe?
prompts.expected_answer: ASTM No. 7 or coarser per E112

prompts.query: What operator certification is required for NDE?
How often must NDE equipment be standardized?
prompts.expected_answer: At beginning/end of each series and intervals not exceeding 4 hours

prompts.query: What drilled hole size is used for ET on NPS 4 duplex pipe?
What wall thickness tolerance applies to NPS 4 seamless pipe?
What is the Schedule 40S wall thickness for 2-inch pipe?
What is the outside diameter of NPS 6 stainless pipe?
What is the maximum cut length overage for duplex pipe?
What is Schedule 10S wall thickness for 4-inch pipe?
Can Schedule 5S and 10S pipe be threaded?
prompts.expected_answer: No, wall thicknesses do not permit threading per ANSI B1.20.1

prompts.query: What is the standard random length range for NPS 8 and smaller?
Which duplex grade is best for chloride stress corrosion cracking?
prompts.expected_answer: Super duplex grades like S32750, S32760, or S39274 with PREN > 40

prompts.query: What is the difference between S31803 and S32205?
prompts.expected_answer: S32205 has tighter Cr (22-23%) and N (0.14-0.20%) ranges vs S31803

prompts.query: Which lean duplex has lowest nickel content?
What austenitic grade is specified for high temperature creep?
prompts.expected_answer: H-grades like TP304H, TP316H, TP321H with controlled grain size

prompts.query: Which grade has copper addition for improved acid resistance?
What is the difference between TP316 and TP316L?
prompts.expected_answer: TP316L has max 0.035% C vs 0.08% for TP316, lower strength but better IGC resistance

prompts.query: Which duplex grade contains cobalt?
What makes S39277 unique among super duplex grades?
prompts.expected_answer: Very low sulfur (0.002% max) and controlled W (0.8-1.2%)

prompts.query: What marking is required on duplex pipe?
prompts.expected_answer: Manufacturer's mark, seamless/welded designation, specification, grade, size, heat number

prompts.query: What marking indicates pipe was not hydrostatically tested?
What suffix indicates pipe supplied without final heat treatment?
What test must HT-O material pass?
prompts.expected_answer: ASTM A923 Method B or C on base metal, weld metal, and HAZ

prompts.query: What documents must accompany certified material?
prompts.expected_answer: Chemical analysis, mechanical test results, heat treatment record per A999/A999M

prompts.query: What is the lot definition for mechanical testing?
prompts.expected_answer: Same size, wall, heat, and heat treatment condition

prompts.query: What marking indicates eddy current tested pipe?
What is the UNS number for 2205 duplex?
What is the UNS number for 2507 super duplex?
What forging grade corresponds to S32205 pipe?
What ASME specification corresponds to ASTM A312?
prompts.expected_answer: SA-312 in ASME BPVC Section II

prompts.query: What forging grade corresponds to S32750?
What is the yield strength for S32101 lean duplex thin wall?
What reduction of area is required for F53 forgings?
What tensile strength applies to TP321 seamless heavy wall?
What is the HRC hardness limit for S32750?
What tensile range applies to F55 (S32760) forgings?
What is the manganese limit for S32205?
What phosphorus limit applies to TP316L?
Does S82441 contain copper?
What distinguishes S32906 chemically?
What is the titanium requirement for TP321?
What is the stabilizing heat treatment for TP321H?
prompts.expected_answer: Temperature lower than initial solution anneal, agreed between purchaser and vendor

prompts.query: What temperature applies to S31254 (254 SMO)?
What is the solution temperature for S32520?
What special heat treatment applies to Alloy 20 (N08020)?
What temperature range applies to S33207 hyper duplex?
What minimum transducer frequency is required for UT?
What maximum ET coil frequency applies to 0.100" wall?
prompts.expected_answer: 50 kHz max for walls up to 0.150 in.

prompts.query: What imperfection depth is acceptable without repair?
prompts.expected_answer: Less than 0.004 in. or 12.5% of wall thickness, whichever is greater

prompts.query: What calibration drift requires retest of all pipes?
prompts.expected_answer: 29% (3 dB) decrease in rejection amplitude from last standardization

prompts.query: What is the face bend test alternative for welded pipe?
prompts.expected_answer: Transverse guided face bend test of the weld per A370

prompts.query: Which lean duplex is manganese alloyed?
What grade replaces 316L for severe chloride service?
prompts.expected_answer: S31254 (6Mo) or duplex S32205 depending on temperature

prompts.query: What supplementary requirement covers product analysis?
What radiographic requirement applies to double welded pipe?
prompts.expected_answer: S5 - 100% RT per ASME BPVC Section VIII, marking 'RT'

prompts.query: What is the common name for S32304?
